Package org.fhnw.aigs.server.gameHandling

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIGSConsoleHandler
    This class is responsible for console input when the server is run in console mode.
    GameLoader
    This class is responsible is part of the plug-in mechanism.
    GameManager
    This class manages all games.
    KeepAliveManager
    This class helps detecting idle clients.
    LoggerTextAreaHandler
    Custom logger for JTextArea.
    Main
    This is the Main class.
    RecompileClassesAction
    Recompile and reloads all the game classes.
    ReloadClassesAction
    Class manages reloading of dynamically loaded classes in the server.
    ServerConfiguration
    Due to the fact that the class uses the Singleton Pattern, it is not possible to instantiate ClientCommunication directly.
    ServerShutdownCleanUp
    If the server shuts down, the ServerShutdownCleanUp.run() method of this class will send a ForceCloseMessage will be sent to all clients.
    ShowLogsAction
    Opens the log file folder.
    StartServerAction
    Responsible for starting the server.
    StopServerAction
    Responsible for stopping the server without closing the server GUI.
    User
    This class is responsible for all User related tasks.
    User.UserList
    This construct is storing users - it was created for XML-parsing purposes and is just a wrapper for an ArrayList which is not natively supported by JAXB without modifications.
